name: Dog ball
description:
Dog Ball Dog ball is the favorite game of Mexican dogs, it helps rex the (protagonist) dog to become the local legend reaching the highest score in the history of dog ball, you just have to dodge the balls that came up against rex, for every dodged ball you will have a point but be careful, if the ball hits you the available scrubber will decrease.   if you are from pc you can use:  A to go left and   B to go to the right.  instead if you are by phone you can simply press the left side of the screen to move to the left, instead presses the right side of the screen to go to the right.   HAVE FUN !!!  by Afrasinei Ionut you want to contact us ?email : afgames.company@gmail.cominstagram : afgames_companywhy contact us?
